lesson.subtitle: Motion - Coming & Going
lesson.description: Learner can form motion verbs with –ø—Ä–∏-, –≤–∏-, –≤-/—É- prefixes
objectives: Learner can form motion verbs with –ø—Ä–∏-, –≤–∏-, –≤-/—É- prefixes
Learner can choose correct prefix for arrival, exit, or entry
Learner can use prefixed motion verbs in sentences
